column4: I am getting a ton of egg_desktop_entries errors from dpkg, anyone know wtf this is?
i get these things too, they seem pretty harmless
they had been for a long time, but they broke bluefish now
file a bug against dpkg then
it looks like its a really common issue
cant seem to find anything that actually nails down what causes it
i have http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ hoary main restricted universe
do i just need to add multiverse to the end of that?
does the multiverse include the marillat codecs?
hrm why is xmms required for mplayer?
